channel.title: [HiyaScape]: Stopping SYI
channel.description:
Hi, my server gets SYIPkpker and I really hate it, I've done the One-connection per IP, but it still doesn't help, any idea how to fix this, please post :cool:
[b][i]Thanks![/i][/b] [size=6pt]I tried all tutorials using the search-bar.[/size]
Edit: Also, I have Anti-null and One connection per IP already in. Does not help.

item.title: [HiyaScape]: Stopping SYI
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“lewis`, post:27, topic:280836”]holy archer , your fucked in the ehad … configure your client to make it so its only people that use YOUR client to get into your server = no crach ebcause the syi connects via your ip but since it blocks it because it isnt on your client it dont work.

dont be retarded[/quote]

he doesnt have a fucking client dumbass.

Holy Archer, I got 1 question. Why are you still using Silab’s?
It would be what Johno said, the crashing client thing. That should work.
Otherwise, get a custom client.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Johno,
if he doesn’t want a client, don’t suggest it more than once.

You just might be able to piece multiple codes together that will officially stop SYI without a client.

~Ituharu

item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Holy Archer:

I tried Stormcutters Anti-null, and Coder-Xynts strong IP ban too, but they don’t work.

Im not sure the IP Ban will work because SYI will change there ip everyime they log in.

Theres this for delta. http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=17908 (Not sure if ur using a delta source)

http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=13481

http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=13684

item.title: [HiyaScape]: Stopping SYI
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“johno2, post:13, topic:280836”]how do u think you connect to a server? If you don’t want to solve it that way, try this

if (playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains(“SYI”)
|| playerName.contains("’") || playerName.contains(“syi”)
|| playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("@")
|| playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("-")
|| playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<")
|| playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains(",")
|| playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("]")
|| playerName.contains("|") || playerName.contains("{")
|| playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("?")
|| playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$")
|| playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^")
|| playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*")
|| playerName.contains("(") || playerName.contains(")")
|| playerName.contains(";") || playerName.contains(":")) {
outStream.createFrame(999999); // this crashes their client hahaha
savefile = false;
appendToBanned(playerName);
disconnected = true;

You can find out where to place it yourself.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2009, 12:08:27 pm[/size][hr][quote author=Psycotix link=topic=370897.msg2802520#msg2802520 date=1243534028]

Obviously you can’t understand what im saying, having your own client = SYI PROBLEMS OVER!
Dude, this is the last time im going to say it, if your to ignorant to understand then gtfo.

this is the last mother fucken time il tell you im fucken sick of you fucking cock sucking faggots I DONT GIVE A SHIT IF I GET MUTED THIS IS FUCKING WORTH IT!!!
FUCK OFF!
WE DO NOT WANT YOUR FAGGOTY FUCKING STUPIDITY IN THIS FUCKING FORUM!@!!!

YOU FUCKING SAD ASS PRICK STOP FUCKEN FLAMING PEOPLE IF YOU HAVE NO IDEA WHAT THE FUCK THERE TALKING ABOUT NOW GTFO AND STFU FAGGOT!!!
[/quote]

Dude, i no what he wants. It’s no flaming, it’s called helping. I told him if he wants to stop SYI make it so only people can connect to a certain client…

Also, are you trying to have a mard with CAPS, or just after some attention?[/quote]
Please, leave. Forever.

Read full topic
